channel.title: Grape Apes Radio
channel.description: Djs playing records. What more could you want?
channel.itunes:subtitle: Music for you Soul
channel.itunes:author: Junkyard Dog
channel.itunes:summary: Djs playing records. What more could you want?

item.title: Episode 10
item.description: Back with episode 10 featuring Chicagos own Maddjazz (Ghetto Division/Brick Bandits) on side A and Grape Apes own KGR on the flip side. Full write up and track listing coming soon on www.grapeapesblog.blogspot.com
item.dc:creator: Junkyard Dog
item.itunes:summary: Back with episode 10 featuring Chicagos own Maddjazz (Ghetto Division/Brick Bandits) on side A and Grape Apes own KGR on the flip side. Full write up and track listing coming soon on www.grapeapesblog.blogspot.com

item.title: Episode 8
item.description: I was hoping to have a guest on this issue but it didnt work out. So instead of waiting Ill just give you a 30 minute disco house set from KGR. Tracklist will be up shortly on the blog www.grapeapesblog.blogspot.com if you would like any older volumes email ripdaily@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 7

item.itunes:summary: one shot mix by kgr. just push play and dance.

item.title: Episode 6
item.description: Got another chance to record. Mostly house in various forms. Mixed by KGR. www.grapeapesblog.blogspot.com for tracklist.
item.dc:creator: Junkyard Dog
item.itunes:summary: Got another chance to record. Mostly house in various forms. Mixed by KGR. www.grapeapesblog.blogspot.com for tracklist.

item.title: Episode 3
item.description: Back again in full effect!! This time we bring you Brooklyn Fires newest wonder kid Figure. Hailing from Louisville, Ky he is set to take over the underground with his pure bass driven sound. Make sure to check out his upcoming west coast tour and headlining spot at LA's Heist. Side A -- Figure Side B -- Junkyard Dog www.grapeapesblog.blogspot.com
item.dc:creator: Junkyard Dog
item.itunes:summary:
Back again in full effect!! This time we bring you Brooklyn Fires newest wonder kid Figure. Hailing from Louisville, Ky he is set to take over the underground with his pure bass driven sound. Make sure to check out his upcoming west coast tour and headlining spot at LA's Heist. Side A -- Figure Side B -- Junkyard Dog
www.grapeapesblog.blogspot.com

item.title: Episode 2
item.description: Back in full effect with Episode 2. This time we have special guest Pres$Money. A San Diego dj/promoter this cat brings the party rock to full effect!! Make sure to check out his night at Bluefoot Lounge on the third friday of the month. Side A -- KGR Side B -- Pres$Money www.grapeapesblog.blogspot.com
